main event: A report was received of an aerial object observed in the sky near Texarkana, Texas on July 14, 1964. The object was described as a bright, white light that was moving and changing shape.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 1 minute.
The reported objects were described as being the size of an orange and ping pong balls.
The objects were reported to have no formation, details, exhaust, sound, or special features.
The objects were observed by a housewife who was sitting in her yard relaxing.
The approximate elevation of the first three objects was 45 degrees in a south-easterly direction.
result: no evidence of unconventional aerial vehicles
sighted object: a bright, white light that was moving and changing shape
